headline: PLDT (PSE:TEL) Valuation: Is There More Room After a 19% One-Month Share Price Surge?
summary: PLDT (PSE:TEL) has seen a steady share price this month, with a 19% gain over the past month and a 4% uptick in the past week. Investors are taking notice of these developments, as they look to understand what is driving the momentum. See our latest analysis for PLDT. After months of sideways action, PLDT’s sudden 19% one-month share price return signals a shift in sentiment and builds on relatively muted year-to-date results. The total shareholder return for the past year stands at 4.5%,...
